original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1201)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4295)@</color> 秒內使我方全體進入無敵狀態，並提升武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4295)@</color> 點武力和智力以及 <color=#ccffcc>60%</color> 爆擊率爆擊傷害，且同時提升士兵 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4300)@</color> 點武力和智力以及 <color=#ccffcc>20%</color> 爆擊率爆擊傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1201)@</color> within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4295)@</color> seconds Make all of us into an invincible state, and increase the generals <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4295)@</color> point of strength and intelligence and <color=#ccffcc>60%</color> critical strike rate, critical strike damage , And at the same time increase the soldier's <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4300)@</color> point of strength and intelligence, and <color=#ccffcc>20%</color> critical strike damage.
